    window.YandexZen.chunkedLoader = {
        create: function() {
            var state = window.YandexZen.state;
            var container = document.getElementById(state.containerId);
            if (!container) {
                throw new Error('No Zen container');
            }
            if (window.YandexZen.promises) {
                return Promise.all(
                    Object.keys(window.YandexZen.promises).map(function(key){ return window.YandexZen.promises[key]})
                )
                .then(function() {
                    if (!window.YandexZen.app) {
                        throw new Error("App hasn't initialized");
                    }
                    window.YandexZen.app.initFromState(
                        Object.assign({}, window.YandexZen.appParams, {
                            zenFeatures: state.zenFeatures,
                            inserts: state.inserts,
                            appPackageUrl: state.appPackageUrl,
                        }),
                        window.YandexZen.state.apiResponse,
                        true,
                        false
                    );
                    return window.YandexZen.app;
                });
            }
        }
